name: Euchre Night
description:
Euchre Night is a beautiful, one-player version of the classic card game. Unliked other card games out there, Euchre night focuses heavily on the user experience with gorgeous retina-quality graphics, gesture-based card play, and fine-tuned AI that makes intelligent decisions just like a Euchre pro. Your teammate will never renege on you!

For those times when you can't corral three friends to play a live game, then this is the app for you!

This brand new app, developed and designed by Shawn Clary, features custom-designed themes for the card deck and the table surface, from Classic Green to a futuristic '2099' theme. More themes to be added in future updates! If you have any suggestions, drop them in our support link and we'll get right on it!

Tell your friends! Tell your family! It's Euchre Night whenever and wherever you want.
